name: Knockout.
description:
Test your brain power with this new puzzle.

Inspired by the 1970s Arkanoid game, the aim is to clear the board of shapes, but you only have one swipe to do so. Version one has 75 brain busting levels which get progressively harder as the game goes on.

Unlike other puzzle games, you can use any finger to do the swiping.

There are no time limits nor any lives in the game. There are infinite retries which make the game relaxing to play.

Fun for all ages.
